title: THE HYPNOTIC POWER OF THE GAZE - FASCINATION / Non-verbal hypnosis masterclass
description:
Dr. Marco Paret and his students demonstrate the hypnotic power of the gaze - Fascination. Fascination is a non-verbal hypnosis technique, in which we use only our gaze and the subject becomes mesmerized. He enters in a state of Charm, followed by a hypnotic Induction. This video is from one of Dr. Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclasses, in which he teaches the ancient techniques of Mesmerism and Fascination. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
